page.title: 06 COAST VIEW COUNTRY CLUB
page.content: INTERVIEW WITH MR MALTBY (manager) 1.When did you start this business ? This business started as a tent field in 1959. In 1963 Teignbridge Council gave planning permission for out - buildings and two site caravans. 2.Are there many others ? One in Teign Haven at Shaldon and one in Ringmore. 3.What are your aims ? To provide independent holiday makers with clean,resonably cheap camping which has indoor activities, entertainment and a day base. 4.What sort of accommadation do you provide ? 2 berth cabins, 5 berth cabins, 15 caravans, 21 4 berth chalets, 10 wood chalets. Altogether 272 beds accommadating nearly 600 people. Each unit contains a shower, toilet, kitchen area and lounge with colour T.V..
